document_data.name: Protection From Magical Traps, 5' Radius
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from magical traps, 5' radius''''' was a [[spell]] used by the [[Red Wizards of Thay]]
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell protected the caster from magic-based [[trap]]s. It created a small area of protection around the caster, 5 feet (1.5 meters) in radius. This protected area moved with the caster. The spell was unable to detect the presence of a magical trap.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a small amount of axle grease.
